title: Got it, and lost it
body:
I can't re-open my Alpha Client after closing it. I only just received it today, so I would like at least a little more time to go through it.

Does anyone know how to amend this?

Plus, does uninstalling the League Alpha remove the download file as well, like the one we got from the internet?

replies.body: Yeah, found that out yesterday when I decided to see if reinstalling made a difference. Same problems occured, but I'm not that bummed, since I got a small insight in everything else. I'll just wait for the Open Beta
